pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Interface for Microclimate Time Series Analysis // An R graphical user interface for microclimate time series, with an emphasis on underground environments. 'KarsTS' provides linear and nonlinear methods, including recurrence analysis (Marwan et al. (2007) 10.1016/j.physrep.2006.11.001) and filling methods (Moffat et al. (2007) doi:10.1016/j.agrformet.2007.08.011), as well as tools to manipulate easily time series and gap sets.
